document_data.name: ''Sahandrian''
document_data.Powers: ''Sahandrian'' was a powerfully enchanted longsword that caused immense pain for anyone attempting to hold the blade aside from Corellon. The effect was even more severe for any [[goblinoid]]s.
document_data.History: In the legendary conflict between [[Gruumsh]] and Corellon, ''Sahandrian'' was destroyed by Gruumsh with the help of Corellon's wife, [[Lolth|Araushnee]], as one of the first acts of Araushnee's betrayal. It was later restored by [[Sehanine Moonbow]]. <ref># [[Elaine Cunningham]] (1999). ''[[Evermeet: Island of Elves]]''. ([[Wizards of the Coast]]), pp. 19â€“28. ISBN [[Special:BookSources/0-7869-1354-1|0-7869-1354-1]].
